bibl.title: Nag Hammadi Codices. Greek and Coptic Papyri from the Cartonnage of the Covers.

series.title: The Coptic Gnostic Library. Nag Hammadi Studies.

bibl.note: P. Nag Hammadi. - Part One: Greek Papyri [Codices I , IV, V, VI, VII, VIII, IX, XI]. Part Two: Coptic Papyri [Codices I, VII, VIII].
bibl.seg: Barns J.W.B. †, G.M. Browne and J.C. Shelton (edited by), Nag Hammadi Codices. Greek and Coptic Papyri from the Cartonnage of the Covers. (The Coptic Gnostic Library. Nag Hammadi Studies. XVI.)
P. Nag Hammadi. - Part One: Greek Papyri [Codices I , IV, V, VI, VII, VIII, IX, XI]. Part Two: Coptic Papyri [Codices I, VII, VIII].

C.R. par J. Bingen, ChrEg 57 (1982) No. 113, pp. 158-159. - L.S.B. MacCoull, Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte 24 (1979-1982) pp. 158-159. - R. Pintaudi, BibO 39 (1982) coll. 100-103. - Tito Orlandi, VetChr 20 (1983) pp. 473-474. - H.-M. Schenke, OLZ 79 (1984) coll. 137-140. - William John Tait, JEA 74 (1988) pp. 299-301.
